com.pilot.jword
Class JWordTextPane

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
                  javax.swing.JEditorPane
                      javax.swing.JTextPane
                          com.pilot.jword.JWordTextPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
public class JWordTextPane
extends javax.swing.JTextPane

A textpane extension with advanced RTF features. The feature include the following and more:

  • Paging
  • Header-footer
  • Multi-section documents
  • Tables
  • Bullets and numbering
  • Mail-merge
  • Fields

See Also:
Serialized Form

insertBefore - insert a column to the left of the current column.
Throws:
javax.swing.text.BadLocationException

insertSection

public void insertSection(int offset,
                          ColumnSettings cs,
                          boolean joinNext)
Creates a new section at the given offset, with given column settings. if offset=-1 then end of body is the destination. joinNext should be true if the next section is to be joined to this one.

Parameters:
offset - insert offset
cs - column settings
joinNext - join with next section

toggleSelectionBulletState

public void toggleSelectionBulletState()
toggles bulletted state of the selected paragraphs. If the range is not numbered/bulletted, it will be made bulletted. If the range is already bulletted it will be unbulletted. If the range is numbered, numbering style will be changed to bullet.

toggleSelectionNumberState

public void toggleSelectionNumberState()
toggles numbered state of the selected paragraphs. If the range is not numbered/bulletted it will be numbered. If the range is already numbered it will be unnumbered. If the range is bulletted, style will be changed to number.

setSelectionCellBorderAttributes

public void setSelectionCellBorderAttributes(BordersAndShadingProperties bsh,
                                             BordersAndShadingProperties oldBash,
                                             boolean wholeRow,
                                             boolean wholeColumn,
                                             boolean wholeTable)
set border attributes of the selected range in the table. if wholeRow is true, all then cells in the selected rows are modified. if wholeColumn is true then cells in the selected columns are modified. if wholeTable is true then all the table is modified

Parameters:
ba - border attributes
wholeRow - apply to the whole row
wholeColumn - apply to the whole column
wholeTable - apply to the whole table

mergeCells

public void mergeCells(int pos,
                       int rowStart,
                       int columnStart,
                       int rowEnd,
                       int columnEnd)
                throws javax.swing.text.BadLocationException,
                       InvalidParameterException
merge table cells specified in the given range. indices are zero based and inclusive.

Parameters:
pos - a position inside the table (or -1 for current caret position)
rowStart - top row
columnStart - leftmost column
rowEnd - bottom row (must be > rowStart)
columnEnd - rightmost column (must be > columnStart)

javax.swing.text.BadLocationException
